game.name: The Wide Open Sky is Running out of Catfish
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A story-driven photography game... on the back of a giant, flying catfish! Transform clouds into sea creatures and bring abundance back to an empty sky!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A story-driven photography game... on the back of a giant, flying catfish! Transform clouds into sea creatures and bring abundance back to an empty sky!
